modal.title: Choose Your Welding Project Size
modal.description: Select the option that best fits your welding project.

memberships.name: Small Project
memberships.description: Ideal for basic welding jobs such as home repairs or small custom pieces.

memberships.name: Medium Project
memberships.description: Perfect for medium-sized tasks like gates, railings, or furniture frames.

memberships.name: Large Project
memberships.description: Best suited for structural work such as frameworks, stairs, or commercial needs.
